text: LATAM Airlines Group S.A. is a Chilean multinational airline holding company headquartered in Santiago, Chile. It is considered the largest airline company in Latin America. The company filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in the United States on 26 May 2020, due to economic problems attributed to the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on aviation. == References == Category:2012 establishments Category:2010s establishments in South America Category:21st- century establishments in Chile Category:Airlines of Chile Category:Organisations based in Santiago, Chile
title: LATAM Airlines Group
